name: Hampton Inn & Suites Orlando Airport at Gateway Village

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is very close to the airport and was ideal for an overnight stay.
reviews.title: Great Stopover
On the doorstep of the airport in Orlando
reviews.text: They provide a free shuttle service to and from the airport.
They provide a complimentary and delicious hot and cold breakfast.
reviews.title: Extremely accommodating staff

reviews.text: They provide free internet service in their business suite.
reviews.title: Above and Beyond!

reviews.text: They provide complimentary hot drinks 24/7 in the foyer.
reviews.title: Front Desk went extra mile

reviews.text: We arrived at the Orlando airport with our 5 yr old granddaughter. We arrived the day before we were to leave on a Disney cruise. We realized we had not made our reservations for this night. They sent a driver to pick us up from the airport & drove us to the hotel. The driver was very prompt & courteous! The staff greeted us & was very helpful. The front desk clerk, Adriane, was very thoughtful when my granddaughter had a problem with her new flip flops. She brought out the band aids!! This was the perfect aid for our granddaughter!! Our room was exceptionally clean!! The driver took us back to the airport the next morning so we could pick up our rental car. They offered to take us anywhere within a 3 mile radius. The breakfast and breakfast area was very good. The pool and pool area was nice! We loved the fire pit area in the evening! We will definitely stay there again!! It was a perfect stay!!!! A+++++
reviews.title: Perfect! Clean! Accompanying!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found this wonderful Hampton Inn when our reservation got cancelled at another hotel. We are glad it got cancelled. Love the closeness to the airport. One of the best hotels we have stayed in Orlando. Excellent breakfast, nice work out center. Stanley (one of the front desk staff members) was outstanding! He needs to be cloned. He is the hardest working hotel person I have met. Book your reservations now if you are traveling to Orlando!
reviews.title: OUTSTANDING PLACE TO STAY!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a great destination for us as we were leaving Orlando for San Diego at 8AM so needed to be close to the airport. Very nice facility, fairly new. We were on the 8th (top floor) at the end where the equipment on the roof was quite noisy. The staff especially Lisa was most helpful. Nice pool.
reviews.title: If you are passing thru

reviews.text: Stayed one night, great stay. In town for business and arrived later than I expected (almost 11 in the evening). Upon arrival staff was friendly and up beat. Was offered water and my choice of snack (HH program). Very nice detail for a weary traveler.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.text: Rooms was superbly clean. Breakfast was typical Hampton fare, very good. Gym was very nice and surprisingly spacious for a hotel gym.
reviews.title: If you are considering this hotel, do yourself a favor and BOOK IT!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We wanted an overnight stay near Orlando airport before commencing our Florida holiday. Lovely building, excellent check in staff, beautiful large room, very clean and comfortable with a pretty good complimentary breakfast. It was a good experience and a bonus that our car hire company was next door. Only negative comment, the planes in the morning woke us but I guess if you stay in an airport hotel you have to expect it. Would certainly return.
reviews.title: Good experience

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel for one night in November 2012 after a late night flight before driving to visit family in Ocala. Although I was only at the hotel for a few hours, I wished I could have picked up the hotel and taken it with me. It was by far one of the best airport hotels I have stayed in. The staff was very pleasant and helpful, the room was clean, and the breakfast was the best hotel breakfast I've had in a long time. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a clean, newer hotel near the Orlando Airport. You won't be disappointed!
reviews.title: GREAT airport hotel!

reviews.text: near to airport.very good and decent sized rooms, we had 2 double beds and they were comfortable for 4 adults.checking person was very well trained and courteous , and we had a very fast checkout on the way to airport, they have a good shuttle service who was right on time and polite and efficient.
reviews.title: very good experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: al in all a very good experience.there is a TGIF nearby .we could not have the breakfast as we left at 6 am but we could see as it was being readied was that it was good
reviews.title: New Hotel at the Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This Hampton Inn is more upscale than others I've tried. Very pleasant atmosphere and staff. Lots of great restaurants nearby. Offers a fly-stay-park program. 24 hour shuttle service to airport very efficient. Driver who picked us up after our flight home, was even able to tell us which car we had parked and let us know he had kept an eye on it.
reviews.title: Close to airport!

reviews.text: We were attending our granddaughter's dance competition & the host hotel was sold out. I read prior reviews of both Hampton Inns nearby & just, for no reason, selected this one. What a wise choice we made! The hotel was new & clean. The front desk personnel were extremely friendly. The proximity to the airport was not a factor for us, but it was very close& the hotel offers a shuttle. Just outside the main entrance are a few restaurants. Bonefish & the NY Diner to name two. We only had breakfast at the hotel once & it was the typical Hampton breakfast, which was fine. We chose to have brunch two days so we ate at the NY diner, but the Hampton breakfast is fine if you're on the go & need to get out quickly. We has a king suite which was very large. The bed was great. The pillows were a little too soft for me, but that's because of my preferences. My husband thought they were fine. The hotel was very close to the highway. If I travels takes us to that area again we would definitely rebook.
reviews.title: We lucked out!

reviews.text: I have never stayed at a hotel that is perfect in so many ways. The service was top notch. The rooms were clean and spacious. The hotel pool we used was warm and clean - towels provided by the pool as well. Thr morning breakfest had a wide variety and was fresh. A special thaks to Sebastian as he picked us up from the airport and we were hungry and so he dropped us of at restaurant close to the hotel and said we also get 15% off there as well. He was very informative about the ares. The hotel is worth every penny.... highly recommended. Feels like home.
reviews.title: Perfect in every way....

reviews.text: There's an older Hampton on the other side of Semoran Blvd but this new property puts it to shame. Soon a Homewood Suites will join it on the west side of the highway.
reviews.title: new, modern facility

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is an elegant property with great facilities.
reviews.title: Accomodating, dining across the street and clean.

reviews.text: The lobby area is gracious, breakfast area is large and accommodating and pool looks like it could be fun (no time for the latter two). Fun watching planes on landing flight pattern overhead and having right-now access to the airport.
reviews.title: New Hampton by Orlando Airport
